pages.text: This item can be used to obtain $(#ce7e00)Resin$() from Dark Oak logs or Cottonwood logs.$(br2)Right-clicking a log with the dagger strips it and gives you a Resin.
If you right-click any Planks block while sneaking, you can turn the block into a Ritual Brazier, which is needed to perform $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_table)Rituals$().
